@chalhoub.com>; MUSE Operations <MUSE.Operations@chalhoub.com>; Roula Keyrouz2 <Roula.Keyrouz2@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Re: UAE RSO - Stella McCartney – Mall Of Emirates Store Closure - September 30th

 

 

Hi shaikha,

The project has been completed, and store is closed. The 3 sets of keys were handed over to the mall management as per Ramez's advise.

 

Thank you everyone for your collaboration and support.

 

Regards

Hamdo

chunks.text:
ami.Riman@chalhoub.com> >; MUSE Operations <MUSE.Operations@chalhoub.com <mailto:MUSE.Operations@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: UAE RSO - Stella McCartney – Mall Of Emirates Store Closure - September 30th

 

Hello All,

 

Please be informed that Stella McCartney – Mall Of Emirates will be permanently closed on September 30th. I will be sharing an invite shortly for a meeting to discuss the necessary action to be taken.

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Hamdo ALDERY <mailto:Hamdo.Aldery@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 3rd Oct before trading hours by/ Service request please to be raised @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 30th September at the EOD @Hamdo ALDERY <mailto:Hamdo.Aldery@chalhoub.com> 
*	Collection of merchandise transfer and loose furniture on 3rd Oct before trading hours  @Sheljan KOCHAPPAN1 <mailto:Sheljan.KOCHAPPAN1@chalhoub.com> @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com> @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 1st Oct 2024 / Ensure cancel of the Cash Collection Service Agreement @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  @Gayasuddin Mirza <mailto:Gayasuddin.Mirza@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please Arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR  and CCTV on 3rd Oct @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> 
*	To request for stock collection and non-Stock ASN appointment from one reach @Heba Jammal <mailto:Heba.Jammal@chalhoub.com>  @Jerbie Bartolome <mailto:Jerbie.Bartolome@chalhoub.com> 
*	Create/ actioned the RTW in system to be reflected in SIOCS before 1st  Oct 2024 @Heba Jammal <mailto:Heba.Jammal@chalhoub.com>  @Jerbie Bartolome <mailto:Jerbie.Bartolome@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Real Emirates - IT Retails <mailto:RealEmirates-ITRetails@chalhoub.com>  @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  Please share the documentation to store email to apply for permits.

*	@Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>   to cancel (AC- Fire Extinguisher) agreement.
*	@Shaikha ALFALASI <mailto:Shaikha.ALFALASI@chalhoub.com>  to de-activate Focus account by 3rd Oct 2024.
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  to provide the clearance of DEWA.
*	@Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  to provide to clearance of Etisalat.
*	@Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com>  please cancel Hussantek.
*	@Irfan Yusuf <mailto:Irfan.Yusuf@chalhoub.com>  to deactivate Kronos.
*	@Alof Joseph <mailto:Alof.Joseph@chalhoub.com>  to schedule a stock take before the closre.

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to contact  me, Shaikha Al Falasi 055-3196770.

 

SHAIKHA ALFALASI​​​​

NATIONAL GRADUATE PROGRAM

C.G.R. FZE

DUBAI
